cont.entity_a: Simulated surround, little or no sound leakage, terrific surround sound, clarity and reception better than the Advent brand, occasional static.
cont.entity_b: Clearer and louder with prominent treble compared to bass, lacks slightly in bass response, fit affects sound quality.
Most comfortable clip-on ear headphones, keeps ears warm after a workout, clip-on attachments feel secure, earpieces pinch after extended wear, fit around the ear is too loose.

cont.entity_a: Poorly constructed with weak plastic joints leading to breakage.
cont.entity_b: Cables are thin, raising concerns about long-term durability, headphones worked well for two months before stopping.

cont.entity_a: Way better battery life with an extra battery always charged, proprietary battery use.

cont.entity_b: White noise occurs about 20% of the time.

Range.comm: Sufficient for use around the house.

cont.entity_a: Volume control is hard to find.

cont.entity_b: Retractable cord is convenient, retracting mechanism works smoothly, cord is too short requiring an extension, only one wire is retractable.
Fit around the ear is too loose, affecting sound quality.
